pull.title: test: add coverage for unknown address type for `createwalletdescriptor`
pull.body: Calling `createwalletdescriptor` RPC with an unknown address type throws an error. This PR adds test coverage for it as done for other RPCs (`getnewaddress `, `getrawchangeaddress`, etc).
